nodes.bodyText:
There are multiple things here:

You should hide not only the giver name but also the giver itself.
You should also hide lastEditorName and lastEditor
We only want to do so for participantComment. I think you can just blindly hiding the field without looking at the visibility for participant comment as the fields should not be used in the frontend.
If you want to follow the visibility, it should be the comment visibility not the response visibility.

Maybe create a method here and call it when participantComment get constructed?
Updated to hide commentGiver, commentGiverName, lastEditorEmail, lastEditorName for participantComment.
